author: Waylander
comment: I like the look of the watchface but the Star background skips and the clock is too small (for me). Urbane 2nd Edition. Update: using new smartwatch (Fossil Q Explorist) no skipping however, digital clock not as big as in pictures but this is a very nice watchface.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Can you provide more information to the developer please, this is the first time I have heard of skipping, since this is not a gif and generated real-time, this would be caused to some sort of CPU lag, what other apps do you have running in the background.  Basically the star animation runs as fast as your CPU can run, so it should not skip??

author: DIP DIP PotatoChip
comment: New Update really makes this watch face shine.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Configuration option now available for 12/24 hours, thank you.  If you would like to update your review.

author: Mark P
comment: Great retro digital look, works mint with my Sony watch
title: Sweet
